reviews.review:
For GMOD people: Check out the workshop or google a workaround. You dont need css.

For others:
just get csgo instead.

CS:Source по сути лучшая часть кс для меня 

Лицуха:Престиж,просто будете видеть кто играет со стимом,а кто нет,бесполезная хрень

Пиратка:Только игра и вам не выдадут вак бан,с лицухой такое не катит
One of the best games i have ever played. Classic
This is the smarter older brother to CS:GO. Valve kinda fucked up with Global Offense. Glad to see the community is still thriving. :] - Spoon

Comprendo que no poseo las cantidad de horas suficientes en este juego como para dar una crítica bastante amplia, ni que tampoco poseo afinidad con las partidas competitivas. No obstante, desde mi punto de vista este juego cumple con todas los requerimientos que deseo en una partida (Gráficos buenos, el detalle de las físicas y partidas entretenidas). Siempre noté comentarios negativos sobre el presente título, pero subjetivamente, este juego supera al CS 1.6 y al GO. Claramente por el hecho que posee lo que busco en un juego con partidas rápidas y entretenidas. Además cabe destacar que GO posee gráficas tremendas y mejores armas incluso, pero no me gustó para nada. Cerrando, recomiendo este juego si lo que buscás es una partida dinámica, y gráficos buenos.

Still fun, I don't have much hours on this particular account, but used to play alot during the oldcss days (v34). Awping is most enjoyable in this one out of the 3, I probably would still do good in pubs.
Reccomended for sure, old but gold.
Super fun slow gameplay that makes stealth really fun

Охеренная игра, намного лучше всех остальных версий как по мне! Отдачу спреить сложно, она там большая, но все равно возможно. Графон старый но похуй, за то 100-200 фпс на слабом компе мб потянет. СОВЕТУЮ
it is old but still good
Командная игра. Всплеск адреналина. Быстротечные схватки. Бои на ножах.

Не нужно убивать игру. Она жива пока в неё играют.

It may not be the most competitive Counter Strike game, it's still the best game for custom game modes including bhop, surf, zombie mode, zombie escape, jailbreak and many more. If you are into that or if you are just a casual player then this is the best cs game for you. 10/10, a masterpiece!

would recommend over csgo because it requires low specs and runs great.If it still works bad just put down all of the video specs to low and change the resolution.Overall its great would 9000% recommend

been playing this game for 20yrs  I am now 50. Yes 50 and still enjoyed it but,.. a lot of buts actually.
1st - used to play with an old timer pc with 2 gb ram and a 500 mbt ATI  Graphics and never has faulted, (I know, you must be pissing yourself)  now playing with 4GB Ram and 2GB graphics and  good Lord, game freezes most of the time on those most important moments. Have run memory checks, cpu checks, all activity shut on task manager, OS upgraded & updated, you name it...BS
2nd - You don't need 20yrs experience to know that players are cheating although Steam believes their anti-cheat is bullet proof...what a lot of rubbish.
SO NO,  I DO NOT RECOMMEND
Einfach ein Geiles Spiel, wird nie seinen Guten Ruf verlieren.
CSGO TOPLULUKLARINDAN DAHA İYİ TOPLULUKLARINA SAHİP ÇOCUK 0YOK DENECEK KADAR HİLESİ İSE O KADAR AZ

This game actually worth my childhood, and it's worth the fund I've used to play this again, legally. 
By the way, seriously, if you're not happy with getting yourself killed over and over again by built-in bots, and you're gonna screech out loud if that ever happen, DON'T you ever download this game. 
But overall, totally impressive! :)

cs：go的品质，cs1.6的匠心，打造了cs系列里不怎么出彩的cs起源，很可惜以前由于steam没有国区，无法接触到这款游戏。加持了起源引擎的cs在现在看来也不过时。
这代cs在地图和经济系统的进步很大。也修复了很多老cs的bug。不愧为经典。
Как альтернатива CSGO  сойдет. 7 куриц из 10
Like most people, I bought this for Garry's Mod but I ended up falling in love with this game.
